this_title: Lego Star Wars: The Yoda Chronicles - The Phantom Clone
trans_title: 乐高星球大战：尤达编年史之幽灵克隆人
introduction: Grievous lures Yoda away from the Jedi Temple and steals the Padawans light sabers. Dooku plans to use the crystals inside the light sabers to make Sith clones. It is up to Yoda and the Padawans to prevent Dooku from carrying out his plan.
chinese_title: 乐高星球大战：尤达编年史之幽灵克隆人
foreign_title: Lego Star Wars: The Yoda Chronicles - The Phantom Clone
